UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: A Defensin from the Model Beetle Tribolium castaneum Acts Synergistically with Telavancin and Daptomycin against Multidrug Resistant Staphylococcus aureus.
Literature.Author: Rajamuthiah R, Jayamani E, Conery AL, Fuchs BB, Kim W, Johnston T, Vilcinskas A, Ausubel FM, Mylonakis E

Literature.Title: Tribolium castaneum defensins are primarily active against Gram-positive bacteria.
Literature.Author: Tonk M, Knorr E, Cabezas-Cruz A, Valdés JJ, Vilcinskas A

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus MW2(MIC=64µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus USA 100(MIC=64µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus USA 300(MIC=64µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus USA 400(MIC=16µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus RN4220(MIC=64µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus Newman(MIC=64µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus Newman DeldltA(MIC=0.5µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=32µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis 9142(MIC=64µg/ml),Enterococcus faecium E007(no activity data),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 77326(no activity data),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 17978(no activity data),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PA14(no activity data),Klebsiella aerogenes EAE 2625(no activity data),Micrococcus luteus DSM 20030(MIC=0.032µM),Bacillus thuringiensis serovar tenebrionis(no activity data),Bacillus thuringiensis serovar kumamtoensis(no activity data),Bacillus thuringiensis serovar tolworthi(MIC=10µM),Staphylococcus aureus DSM 20231(no activity data),Staphylococcus epidermidis DSM 20044(MIC=10µM),Escherichia coli 1103(no activity data),Pseudomonas entomophila CCUG 61470(no activity data),Saccharomyces cerevisiae YSC2(no activity data)
